item.title: Model and Project the death toll of coronavirus at Wuhan Province in R
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will show you how to scrape that data from html table, which lives in a Wikipedia and download the data for further processing. Let us load the packages we need for the session. I will focus on the Wuhan coronavirus to illustrate the point. 86 people died in a single day in China on Friday 7th, February 2020. The coronavirus death toll has risen to at least 805, and the vast majority have died in mainland China.
